name: Obscured Light
description: Intelligence and clarity operating under constraints. Like the sun below the earth, this represents inner radiance maintaining its strength despite external darkness.
image: Fire beneath the earth, maintaining brightness while concealed

lines_in_transition.6: Breaking Free: Light finally emerges from darkness; Maintain wisdom gained in shadow
lines_in_transition.5: Inner Radiance: Wisdom shines despite external darkness; Let truth guide through confusion
lines_in_transition.4: Protected Light: Preservation through careful concealment; Guard your resources
lines_in_transition.3: Sudden Darkness: Unexpected challenges to clarity; Adapt to changing conditions
lines_in_transition.2: Sustained Brightness: Maintaining inner light; Nurture internal wisdom
lines_in_transition.1: Initial Dimming: Recognition of approaching darkness; Prepare for challenges

tholonic_analysis.negotiation: Balance between expression and preservation. The hexagram shows how wisdom can thrive even when constrained. Represents negotiation between visibility and protection.
tholonic_analysis.limitation: Creates protection through concealment. The earth above contains and protects the fire below, showing how limitation can preserve rather than extinguish.
tholonic_analysis.contribution: Contributes by demonstrating how awareness can persist and develop under adverse conditions. Like a seed growing underground, this constraint enables future emergence.
tholonic_analysis.significance_in_thologram: Represents crucial phases where development must occur hidden from view. Shows how temporary constraint can strengthen rather than weaken a system.

no_moving_lines: A period where wisdom must be cultivated internally. Accept this time of restricted expression as necessary for development. Focus on inner growth.
all_moving_lines: Complete transformation from concealment to expression approaching. The period of constraint has served its purpose. Prepare for emergence while maintaining gained wisdom.
